items.summary: Add a new Hub card titled "Daily Utilities" on the main hub page (frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx) that navigates to a dedicated Daily Utilities page when selected.
Wire a new "daily" route into app navigation by extending the Page union and route switch in frontend/src/App.tsx, and ensure AppLayout back navigation returns to the hub as it does for other pages.

Create a new dedicated page component for "Daily Utilities" that presents the requested tools on a single page using a responsive tabbed interface consistent with existing multi-tool pages (e.g., uses frontend/src/components/WrappingTabsHeader.tsx), with clear input/output sections and consistent Clear/Copy interactions where applicable using the existing copy helper (frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts).

Implement the Daily Utilities tool logic entirely on the frontend (no backend changes) and add shared, reusable frontend utility functions for time/timer scheduling calculations (countdowns, stopwatch formatting, pomodoro cycles, time zone offset comparisons, calendar generation, and shift/rota hour calculations) in a new or existing lib module.
